Consultant Services Email 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Partha,
Unfortunately, last year based on some changes with immigration; we stopped doing all H1 Sponsorships L
Steve
From: padyala parthasaradhy [mailto:padyala001@yahoo.com] Sent: Thursday, December 15, 2011 8:03 AM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Padyala
Hi,
I have worked with one of your employees sometime back. Iam looking for a new h1 sponsorship do let me know if you process h1 visa.
Thanks Partha
From: Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> To: padyala001@yahoo.com Sent: Thursday, 15 December 2011 6:15 PM Subject: MBO Partners / Padyala Dear Padyala, I noticed that you recently visited our website! We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to personally reach out and offer any assistance I can to help you find the answers you might be looking for. If you would like to chat, you may easily book a time convenient for you in my online schedule by going here https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC. Regards, Steven ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
